title: Looking at Britain: British press
brief_description: Fleet Street is the home of three-quarters of England’s major newspapers, 16 million of which are printed every day. Shows how a newspaper gathers its news, the various functions of its staff, printing, despatch and distribution.
description: Fleet Street is the home of three-quarters of England’s major newspapers, 16 million of which are printed every day. Shows how a newspaper gathers its news, the various functions of its staff, printing, despatch and distribution.
